sourcesContent:
<template>
  <a-layout class="layout">
    <a-layout-content style="padding: 24px">
      <a-card title="新用户注册" :bordered="false">
        <a-form
          ref="registerForm"
          :form="form"
          :rules="rules"
          @submit="handleSubmit"
          layout="vertical"
        >
          <a-form-item
            name="username"
            label="新用户名"
            :labelCol="{ span: 24 }"
            :wrapperCol="{ span: 24 }"
            hasFeedback
          >
            <a-input
              v-model:value="formFieldValues.username"
              placeholder="请输入新用户名"
            />
          </a-form-item>
          <a-form-item
            name="password"
            label="密码"
            :labelCol="{ span: 24 }"
            :wrapperCol="{ span: 24 }"
            hasFeedback
          >
            <a-input-password
              v-model:value="formFieldValues.password"
              placeholder="请输入密码"
            />
          </a-form-item>
          <a-form-item
            name="confirm"
            label="确认密码"
            :labelCol="{ span: 24 }"
            :wrapperCol="{ span: 24 }"
            hasFeedback
          >
            <a-input-password
              v-model:value="formFieldValues.confirm"
              placeholder="请确认密码"
            />
          </a-form-item>
          <a-form-item
            name="employeeKey"
            label="员工密钥（可选）"
            :labelCol="{ span: 24 }"
            :wrapperCol="{ span: 24 }"
          >
            <a-input
              v-model:value="formFieldValues.employeeKey"
              placeholder="请输入员工密钥"
            />
          </a-form-item>
          <a-form-item
            name="phone"
            label="手机号（可选）"
            :labelCol="{ span: 24 }"
            :wrapperCol="{ span: 24 }"
          >
            <a-input
              v-model:value="formFieldValues.phone"
              placeholder="请输入手机号"
            />
          </a-form-item>
          <a-form-item :wrapperCol="{ span: 24, offset: 0 }">
            <a-button type="primary" htmlType="submit">提交注册</a-button>
            <a-button style="margin-left: 8px" @click="handleCancel"
              >取消注册</a-button
            >
          </a-form-item>
        </a-form>
      </a-card>
    </a-layout-content>
  </a-layout>
</template>

<script>
import { defineComponent } from "vue";
import { Form, Input, Button, Card, Layout } from "ant-design-vue";
import { useForm } from "ant-design-vue"; // 确保正确导入 useForm

export default defineComponent({
  components: {
    "a-layout": Layout,
    "a-layout-content": Layout.Content,
    "a-card": Card,
    "a-form": Form,
    "a-form-item": Form.Item,
    "a-input": Input,
    "a-input-password": Input.Password,
    "a-button": Button,
  },
  setup() {
    const [form] = useForm(); // 使用 useForm 钩子
    const rules = {
      // 表单验证规则
    };

    const handleSubmit = (values) => {
      console.log("Received values of form: ", values);
    };

    const handleCancel = () => {
      form.resetFields();
    };

    return {
      form,
      rules,
      handleSubmit,
      handleCancel,
    };
  },
});
</script>

<style scoped>
.layout {
  height: 100vh;
}
</style>
